name: Karina Lipayon
text: The dangerous thing is they're using these guesstimates to make up their list of people to Tokhang tapos may quota pa ang kada station. Soon enough they'll be putting random people in there just to meet the quota otherwise they'll be suspended or sacked just like that chief of police from Iloilo. Ewan ko ha pero parang di talaga pinagisipan tong drug war na to.
